name: 愛依
text:
みなさまご注目ください
こちらタネも仕掛けもございません……
trans:
Everyone, your attention please!
As you can clearly see, my hands are completely empty…

name: 愛依
text:
ポン！　ほら～、旗だよ旗～！
すごくない？　ヤバくない？
trans:
But poof! Lookie here, it's a flag~!
Isn't this awesome? Isn't this totally nuts?

name: 冬優子
text: へえ、なかなかやるじゃ──
trans: Hey, not bad at all─

name: あさひ
text: ──さっき袖から見えてたっす！
trans: ─It was peeking outta your sleeve!

name: 愛依
text:
もー！　そういうこと教えちゃダメだって～
まだ練習中だって言ってんじゃん～！！！
trans:
Aww! Don't you go spoiling the trick~
I told you I was still practicing~!!!

name: あさひ
text: 冬優子ちゃんは驚いてたっすよ！
trans: Fuyuko-chan was real surprised!

name: 愛依
text:
え？　マジでマジで～？
ちょっとはできてたってこと～？
trans:
Eh? No way, really~?
Doesn't that mean it was pretty good~?

name: 冬優子
text:
ふ、ふゆもわかってたわよ！
黙ってあげてただけ！
trans:
I-I knew the trick too!
I just kept my mouth shut, that's all!

name: 愛依
text: え～、じゃあダメダメじゃーん
trans: Eeh, then it's a total bust~

name: 冬優子
text:
ていうかどうしたわけ？
急に手品なんか
trans:
Anyways, what's all this for?
Why are you doing magic tricks out of nowhere?

name: 愛依
text:
家族でクリパするから
その練習～♪
trans:
I'm having a Christmas party with my family,
so I'm practicing for that~♪

name: 冬優子
text: ふーん……ま、頑張りなさい
trans: Huh…Well, do your best.

name: 愛依
text: できるようになったらまた見せたげるしっ！
trans: I'll show you again once I have it down!

name: 愛依
text: そだ、あさひちゃん家はクリスマス何する系？
trans: Oh, that's right! Asahi, you doing anything with your folks for Christmas?

name: あさひ
text: 特に考えてないっすね
trans: I didn't really think about that.

name: あさひ
text: 何しようかな……
trans: What should I do…

name: あさひ
text: あ！　そうだ！　サンタ！
trans: Ah! That's right! Santa!

name: 愛依
text: ん？
trans: Hmm?

name: あさひ
text: サンタ探すっす！
trans: I'm gonna look for Santa!

name: 冬優子
text:
そんなこと言ったってあんた
サンタなんて──
trans:
Are you being serious?
You know Santa's not─

name: 冬優子
text: ──……どうやって探すっていうのよ
trans: ─…I mean how are you even going to find him?

name: あさひ
text:
そもそもいるかどうかが
わからないっすよね
trans:
In the first place,
I don't even know if he's real.

name: 冬優子
trans: …Huh?

name: あさひ
text: 証明できてないんすよ、存在が！
trans: His existence hasn't been proven yet!

name: あさひ
text: まずはそこから解き明かすっす！
trans: I've gotta solve that mystery first!

name: あさひ
text:
というわけなんでふたりも
何かあったら教えるっすよ！
trans:
So, if you two see anything
lemme know!

name: 愛依
text: オッケー！
trans: OK!

name: あさひ
text: 事務所のみんなにも聞いてみるっすかね～
trans: Maybe I'll go ask everyone else in the office too~

name: 冬優子
text: 迷惑だけはかけるんじゃないわよ
trans: Don't go around making trouble for everyone.

name: あさひ
text: たくさん知恵が集まれば、きっとわかるっすよ～
trans: I'll definitely figure it out if I gather lots of info~

name: 愛依
text: じゃ、お次は～、冬優子ちゃん
trans: Alright, Fuyuko-chan, you're up next~

name: 冬優子
text: え？
trans: Eh?

name: あさひ
text: 冬優子ちゃんも『プレゼン・フォー・ユー』するっす！
trans: Do a Fuyuko-chan "Presents For You" too!

name: 冬優子
text:
…………
そんな呑気なこと、言ってられんのあんたたち
trans:
……
Can you guys even say that so lightly?

name: 冬優子
text:
海外ロケがかかってんのよ
仕事のことを考えなさい、仕事のことを！
trans:
Our overseas shoot is at stake here.
Focus on your work, dammit, your work!

name: 冬優子
text: 大事なのは今年でしょ！
trans: This year is important, you know!

name: 冬優子
text:
ふゆたちはアイドルなんだから
クリスマスもファンを楽しませるの
trans:
Remember, we're idols, so even on 
Christmas we should be entertaining the fans.

name: 冬優子
text: 自分たちが楽しむのはそれからよ
trans: Our own fun should come after that.

name: 愛依
text: 冬優子ちゃん……
trans: Fuyuko-chan…

name: 愛依
text: ──アハハッ、うちらアイドルやってんだね～
trans: ─Ahahah, guess we really are idols~

name: 愛依
text:
クリスマスなんて遊びの予定しか入ってなかったのにさ
今年は仕事ってヤバくない～？
trans: I wasn't even thinking about anything but having fun this Christmas, but we've got lots of work on our plate, huh~?

name: あさひ
text: わたしはどっちも思いっきりやるっす！
trans: I'm gonna do both to the fullest!

name: 愛依
text: おおっ、あさひちゃんメラメラきてる～
trans: Ooh, Asahi-chan's all fired up~

name: 愛依
text:
よーっし！　じゃあお仕事もバッチリ決めて
楽しくパーティ過ごせるように頑張るぞ～！
trans:
Alriiight! Then I'm gonna nail it at all my jobs,
then go have an kickass party afterwards~!

name: あさひ＆愛依
text: おーっ！
trans: Yeah!

name: 冬優子
text: なんかズレてる気もするけど……
trans: I get the feeling they're not really getting it…

name: 冬優子
text: ま、いっか……
trans: Well, that's fine too…
